tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE donations (donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  donation_date DATE,
  donation_purpose TEXT);

CREATE TABLE donors (donor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name TEXT,
  donor_email TEXT,
  donor_phone TEXT);

CREATE TABLE donation_logs (log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donation_id INT,
  donor_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  remarks TEXT);

CREATE TABLE donation_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id INT,
  donation_id INT,
  type_id INT,
  donation_amount DECIMAL,
  donation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE donation_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donation_id INT,
    donor_id INT,
    organization_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    donation_amount DECIMAL,
    donation_date DATE
);
